item.title: Streamer Zeam Acquires NewsOn Platform From Sinclair Broadcast Group
item.description: Streamer Zeam has acquired the NewsOn local broadcast streaming platform from Sinclair Broadcast Group. The deal comes as Zeam is looking to expand its offerings and broaden the reach of its public-fa
